p: RNA or DNA extractions were performed using the QIAmp MinElute Virus Spin Kit (Qiagen, Inc., Valencia, CA). Real-time RT-PCR/PCR was conducted on a BioRad CFx96 C1000 Touch Thermal Cycler Real-Time system at NIHE, MIPM, and Duke-NUS in Singapore. Conventional RT-PCR was conducted at Duke-NUS using SuperScript III One-Step RT-PCR System with Platinum Taq DNA Polymerase.
